Title: Merula Shell
Description: Merula shell is a Windows shell replacement. Use the library of Merula Shell to create your own windows shell in WPF. Currently there is a DEMO avaible to show you wat Merula shell can do.

Project Description
Merula shell is a Windows shell replacement. Use the library of Merula Shell to create your own windows shell in WPF. Currently there is a DEMO avaible to show you wat Merula shell can do.
